title: My Busy Week
description: Finger painting, learning addition and a school trip to the zoo are just some of the universal moments of childhood that a busy boy experiences during his week.This basic concept book uses predictable language to teach the days of the week. While being a quick read for busy parents, children will be able to "read" along with the simple, fun text while enjoying the charming illustrations.
author: Lovey Sweetiepie
